The video clip was published on Facebook: 2020, and had a duration of one minute and 16 seconds.
The post caption accompanying the video: Pakistan slogans were shouted outside Silchar Airport by members of the All India United Democratic Front (AIUDF), specifically targeting the party's leader Badruddin Ajmal.
The claim was amplified on social media: s Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP), with multiple posts sharing the video and endorsing the claim.
